news.title: The Weekly Injection: New Releases From BORN OF OSIRIS, IMPUREZA & More Out This Week 7/11
news.summary:
Plus releases from Calva Louise, Enter Shikari, In the Company of Serpents, and Hell. 
 The post  The Weekly Injection: New Releases From BORN OF OSIRIS, IMPUREZA & More Out This Week 7/11  appeared first on  Metal Injection .
